ModMetaData.name: Teleporter Room
ModMetaData.author: HopeSeekr
ModMetaData.description:
Version 6 The BetterRimworlds Teleporter Room enables the teleportation of any Pawns and Things inside the teleport room instantaneously, anywhere on the planet.
**ALERT: The Dematerializer has *harsh* consequences for all higher lifeforms on the map in the case of power failure!**
